Class.ClassComment: NamespaceMappingParser /** * NamespaceMappingParser. This interface defines methods exposed by a namespace-mapping-aware parser (such as {@link ParserRegistry} * @author Tristan Tarrant * @since 6.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Recursively parses the current element of an XML stream using an appropriate {@link ConfigurationParser} depending on the element's namespace. * @param reader the XML stream reader * @param holder a configuration holder * @throws XMLStreamException */
